name: Cresselia
description:
Those who sleep holding cresselia's
feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is
said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Crescent Glow
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you go second and it’s your first turn, instead search for up to 3 Psychic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Photon Laser
attacks.effect: If you have at least 5 Energy in play, this attack does 90 more damage.
